response.original_title: BEST BEFORE - The Mark Thomas Comedy Product Vintage Cuts
response.overview: Mark Thomas' ground breaking, law changing, corporate shaking show is back and will be live-streamed on Thu 19 Nov for just 24 hours!  For 7 years, 6 series and a host of specials, The Mark Thomas Comedy Product caused mayhem on Channel 4â€™s airwaves. Before The Revolution Will be Televised, Lee Nelson, Dom Jolly and Balls of Steel, this was the show that set the agenda. It challenged politicians, cost them their careers, was talked about in Parliament, appeared on the front pages of the Guardian and basically had a ball.
response.title: BEST BEFORE - The Mark Thomas Comedy Product Vintage Cuts
